'Hybrid' is a split EP by the Italian and American pop punk bands Melody Fall
and Better Luck Next Time. It was released on May 17, 2008, in Japan only by
InYa Face Records. A limited run of 600 copies was put out in the United States
by World Records on November 11, 2008.
